text: Ceará is one of the 26 states of Brazil. It is in the northeastern part of the country, on the Atlantic coast. Ceará has many beaches, which brings a lot of tourism. By people, it is the 8th largest state. By size, it is the 17th largest state. == Geography == Ceará has an area of 148,016 km², making it the 17th largest state by size. It shares borders on the east by the states of Rio Grande do Norte and Paraíba, on the south by Pernambuco state, and on the west by Piauí. Its northern border is the Atlantic Ocean. Its capital is Fortaleza. ==References== == Other websites == * Official Government Site * Tourism guide Ceará * Fortaleza Tourism guide and maps
title: Ceará
